mapper.update: update mkt_verbal_condition set VERBAL_ID = #{verbalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LEFT_PARAM = #{leftParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEFT_PARAM_TYPE = #{leftParamType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_TYPE = #{operType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIGHT_PARAM = #{rightParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIGHT_PARAM_TYPE = #{rightParamType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CONDITION_ID = #{conditionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select CONDITION_ID, VERBAL_ID, LEFT_PARAM, LEFT_PARAM_TYPE, OPER_TYPE, RIGHT_PARAM, RIGHT_PARAM_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK from mkt_verbal_condition where CONDITION_ID = #{conditionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
